options: ['they want to buy cakes', "it is Rick's birthday that day", 'Rick asks them to come', 'they come for a party']
questions: One evening, the customers come to Rick's shop because  _  .
article: Rick is a good man.He makes birthday cakes in a shop.His cakes are great and have very good prices,so many people buy his cakes.He makes friends with lots of his customers .They all like him very much.One evening.he wants to go home,but many of his old customers come in.Rick smiles to them,"I am sorry.It is late today.If you need cakes,please come tomorrow."One of them takes out a nice cake and says to him,"You make so many great cakes for us.This birthday cake is for you.Happy birthday, Rick."
